name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facebook Group/Page Posts Extractor & GPT Analysis
name.zh_CN: Facebook群组/公共主页帖子提取与GPT分析

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download and analyze Facebook Group and Page posts with one click, gaining deep insights powered by GPT.
short.zh_CN: 一键下载并分析Facebook群组和公共主页的帖子，借助GPT获取深度洞察。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plugin Description:

Download and analyze Facebook Group and Page posts with one click, gaining deep insights powered by GPT.

Key Features:

One-Click Export: Easily export posts from Facebook Groups/Pages to Excel or CSV files.
Comprehensive Data Extraction: Export posts with the following details:
Title
Author
Content
Time
URL
Number of Comments
Interaction Count
Share Count
GPT Intelligent Analysis: Perform multi-dimensional AI analysis on downloaded posts, including:
Popular Hashtags
Trending Keywords
Core Discussion Topics
Brand Focus
Top Products
User Engagement Intent
User Needs
Custom Analysis: Supports customizing up to 5 analysis dimensions to meet personalized requirements.
Usage Notice:

When your available subscription count is zero, you will not be able to continue using the analysis feature. Please upgrade your subscription to continue.
Example Error Message:
"Your available subscription count is 0"
By installing this extension, you agree to Voicein's Privacy Policy (https://shenging.com/policy/).

For any requirements, questions, or feedback, feel free to contact us at third@shenging.com

Legal Disclaimer:

Facebook™ is a trademark of Facebook Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This is an independent project developed by Voicein and has no affiliation with Facebook or Facebook Inc.
long.zh_CN:
插件描述：

一键下载并分析Facebook群组和专页的帖子，借助GPT获取深度洞察。

主要功能：

一键导出： 轻松将Facebook群组/专页的帖子导出为Excel或CSV文件。
全面数据提取： 导出包含以下信息的帖子：
标题
作者
内容
时间
URL
评论数
互动数
分享数
GPT智能分析： 对下载的帖子进行多维度AI分析，包括：
热门Hashtags
趋势关键词
核心讨论主题
品牌关注度
热门产品
用户互动意图
用户需求
自定义分析： 支持自定义5个分析维度，满足个性化需求。
使用须知：

当您的套餐可用次数为0时，您将无法继续使用分析功能。请升级您的套餐以继续使用。
错误信息示例：
"您的套餐可用次数为0"
安装此扩展表示您同意Voicein的隐私政策（https://shenging.com/policy/）。

如有任何需求、问题或反馈，欢迎联系我们：third@shenging.com

法律声明：

Facebook™是Facebook Inc.在美国和其他国家的注册商标。本项目由Voicein独立开发，与Facebook或Facebook Inc.无关。
